short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension shows numbers for each Trello card in the Trello app from Trello.com.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shows numbers for each Trello card in the Trello app from Trello.com.
To Use:
1. Navigate to your Trello Board with cards.
2. Click the extension icon. Ta-Da!
3. To remove numbers, just refresh the page.
